hero.title: Save all memories from your <accent>wedding</accent>
hero.description: A simple way to collect all the photos your guests took during the wedding in one place, without complications.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.description: A simple way to collect all the photos your guests took during the wedding in one place, without complications.
howItWorks.step1Description: Create your event in a few simple steps
howItWorks.step2Description: Share a unique QR code with your guests
howItWorks.step3Description: Guests upload photos directly from their phones
howItWorks.step4Description: Access all photos in one place

benefits.title: Why use our application
benefits.subtitle: Benefits you get
benefits.benefit1Description: Intuitive interface for you and your guests
benefits.benefit2Description: Guests can upload photos directly through a web browser
benefits.benefit3Description: Only you have access to the photos
benefits.benefit4Description: Photos are stored in their original resolution
benefits.benefit5Description: Intuitive interface for you and your guests
benefits.benefit6Description: Guests can upload photos directly through a web browser

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.subtitle: What our users say
testimonials.testimonial1Text: Excellent app! We managed to collect over 300 photos from our guests that we wouldn't have otherwise.
testimonials.testimonial2Text: Our guests were delighted by how easy it was to add photos. We recommend it to everyone!
testimonials.testimonial3Text: The best way to save all wedding memories in one place.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.answer1: Yes, the basic version of the application is completely free to use.
faq.question2: How many photos can guests upload?
faq.answer2: Each guest can upload up to 10 photos.
faq.question3: How long are the photos stored?
faq.answer3: Photos are stored for 1 months after the wedding.
faq.question4: Do guests need to create an account?
faq.answer4: No, guests sign in only with their name and email address.

footer.title: Save all memories from your wedding
footer.subtitle: A simple way to collect all the photos your guests took during the wedding in one place, without complications.

common.title: If you have any questions or suggestions, please let us know.
common.subtitle: Your feedback is important to us. We read and use all comments and suggestions to improve the application.
